summary: Water quality is generally stable but pH is slightly below optimal range for tilapia.

insights.recommendation: Consider adding a pH buffer to stabilize levels closer to 7.5.
Monitor TDS levels; consider partial water changes if it continues to rise.
Maintain temperature around 28°C for optimal growth; consider heating if it drops further.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.047 / 7.021 / 7.08 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 308.56 / 295.1 / 347.6 ppm (trend: down)
• Temp avg/min/max: 28.677 / 26.75 / 30.06 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
